name: Website Analytics Load
description: Dataflow Flex Template to load website analytics data from GCS to BigQuery.

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: Input GCS File Pattern
parameters.helpText: Cloud Storage file pattern of the JSONL input files (e.g., gs://your-bucket/*.jsonl).

parameters.name: output_dataset
parameters.label: BigQuery Output Dataset ID
parameters.helpText: BigQuery dataset ID to write the output tables to.

parameters.name: visits_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Visits Table Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery table for visits.

parameters.name: events_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Events Table Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery table for events.

parameters.name: purchase_items_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Purchase Items Table Name
parameters.helpText: Name of the BigQuery table for purchase items.
